MITREAttackScrapper.mitigations package

Submodules

MITREAttackScrapper.mitigations.enterprise module

MITRE ATT&CK Enterprise Mitigations

This module contains methods to parse MITRE ATT&CK Enterprise Mitigations.

Classes:

MITREAttackEnterpriseMitigations : Parses MITRE ATT&CK Enterprise Mitigations.

Methods:

get_list() -> List[Dict[str, Any]] :

Get the list of all MITRE ATT&CK mitigations for Enterprise.

get(mitigation_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any] :

Get the details of a specific MITRE ATT&CK mitigation for Enterprise.

class MITREAttackScrapper.mitigations.enterprise.MITREAttackEnterpriseMitigations

Bases: MITREAttackInformation

A class containing methods to parse MITRE ATT&CK Enterprise Mitigations.

static get(mitigation_id: str) → Dict[str, Any]

Get the details of a specific MITRE ATT&CK mitigation for Enterprise.

Parameters:

mitigation_id (str) – The ID of the specific MITRE ATT&CK mitigation.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the details of the specified MITRE ATT&CK mitigation.

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the mitigation ID does not exist in the MITRE ATT&CK Enterprise mitigations.

  • RuntimeError – If there’s a failure in fetching data from the MITRE ATT&CK website.

Example

The structure of the returned data is as follows:

{
    "id": "M1234",
    "name": "Mitigation Name",
    "version": "1.0",
    "created": "2021-01-01",
    "last_modified": "2021-01-01",
    "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/mitigations/M1234/",
    "description": "Mitigation Description",
    "techniques_addressed_by_mitigation": [
        {
            "domain": "Enterprise",
            "id": "T1234",
            "name": "Technique Name",
            "use": "Technique Use",
            "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1234/"
        }
    ],
    "references": {
        1: {
            "text": "Reference 1",
            "url": "https://example1.com"
        },
        2: {
            "text": "Reference 2",
            "url": "https://example2.com"
        }
    }
}
static get_list() → List[Dict[str, Any]]

Get the list of all MITRE ATT&CK mitigations for Enterprise.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries containing MITRE ATT&CK mitigations data.

Return type:

List[Dict[str, Any]]

Example

The structure of the returned data is as follows:

[
    {
        "id": "M1234",
        "name": "Mitigation Name",
        "description": "Mitigation Description",
        "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/mitigations/M1234/"
    },
    ...
]
